title: Fighting On Camera
description:
Lauren and Jeremy endure their first podcast-recorded fight after a tense conversation around Lauren’s future content. They discuss what determines a Netflix cheating scandal and if Jeremy’s recent violation of a Gossip Girl episode qualifies as such.
